meleeWeapon.name: Blade of Adventure
meleeWeapon.description: A long, sharp blade hammered out of vehicle leaf springs. Well-rounded for most situations.

meleeWeapon.name: Blade of Gul
meleeWeapon.description: A short, but thick sword, used by Gul Warriors. It's compact design makes for swift yet hard-hitting blows. An excellent close-range option.

meleeWeapon.name: Bone Chopper
meleeWeapon.description: A razor-sharp hand axe. Excellent for separating flesh from bone. Charge for double attacks.

meleeWeapon.name: Edge of the Forest
meleeWeapon.description: An elegant, yet light blade, designed to bring beauty to bloodshed. Unstoppable in the hands of a master swordsman.

meleeWeapon.name: Iron Greatsword
meleeWeapon.description: A giant broadsword made from flattened railroad tracks. Dozens of ridges cut in the side for causing irreparable damage.

meleeWeapon.name: Knuckle Dusters
meleeWeapon.description: Steel knuckles with rusty sawblade tips, designed to boost Unarmed damage.

meleeWeapon.name: Ornate Blade
meleeWeapon.description: An intricately-forged elongated sword. Designed to keep stronger enemies at bay, while remaining light enough for agile maneuvers.

meleeWeapon.name: Ornate Flail
meleeWeapon.description: An intricately-forged mace with uniquely designed airways. Allows smaller wielders to get the mace up to speed much quicker.

meleeWeapon.name: Rebellion Spear
meleeWeapon.description: A spear perfect for staying at a distance. Has excellent range, great recovery, and focused direct damage for one on one combat.

meleeWeapon.name: Royal Broadsword
meleeWeapon.description: Standard issue Greatsword for the Empress's Royal Guards. Razor-sharp edges, extremely heavy, yet perfectly balanced.

meleeWeapon.name: Rusted Claws
meleeWeapon.description: A pair of old-canine training bracers converted into deadly claws. Used for slashing and ripping.

meleeWeapon.name: Scrap Hammer
meleeWeapon.description: A large, heavy warhammer cobbled together from engine components. It is a slow- but-devastating weapon meant to destroy anything it hits.

meleeWeapon.name: Scrap Hatchet
meleeWeapon.description: A common chopping tool that has been repurposed for combat. Rapidly cycles attacks from right to left. Charge attacks strike twice.

meleeWeapon.name: Scrap Staff
meleeWeapon.description: A staff made from old plumbing parts used for controlling wide swaths in front of the wielder.

meleeWeapon.name: Steel Flail
meleeWeapon.description: An unorthodox weapon meant to convert momentum into destruction. Some attacks can continuously chain overhead swings.

meleeWeapon.name: Steel Katana
meleeWeapon.description: An old piece of steel with serrations cut into one side. Pipe handle provides limited grip.

meleeWeapon.name: Steel Spear
meleeWeapon.description: A spear perfect for staying at range with quick, focused attacks. High, single-target damage.

meleeWeapon.name: Steel Sword
meleeWeapon.description: A long, sharp blade hammered out of vehicle leaf springs. Well-rounded for most situations.

meleeWeapon.name: Vice Grips
meleeWeapon.description: A N'Erudian tool converted into a ruthless ripping device. High raw damage.

meleeWeapon.name: Atom Smasher
meleeWeapon.description: A powerful crushing device that harnesses rocket technology to increase smashing force.

meleeWeapon.name: Assassin's Dagger
meleeWeapon.description: Lightweight. Silent. Deadly. It's rumored that the blade is meant to bestow a slow, agonizing death.

meleeWeapon.name: Atom Splitter
meleeWeapon.description: A giant tool for splitting heavy rocks.

meleeWeapon.name: Dreamcatcher
meleeWeapon.description: There is an ethereal lightness to this weapon, as though it were made of paper or breath.Though it strikes its foes forcibly enough.

meleeWeapon.name: Feral Judgement
meleeWeapon.description: A pair of gauntlets with sharp crystal blades that strike with vicious speed and velocity.

meleeWeapon.name: Gas Giant
meleeWeapon.description: Dealing damage unleashes the dormant Toxic Gas within the head. When infused, Basic Attacks apply CORRODED for 5s.

meleeWeapon.name: Hero's Sword
meleeWeapon.description: An ancient, quick, and versatile blade suited for many situations. Charge attacks cast a projectile for dealing melee damage at range.

meleeWeapon.name: Huntress Spear
meleeWeapon.description: The spear is oddly...quiet. Even when you slide your hand across its haft or drop it upon the ground, it makes an unthinkably small amount of noise.

meleeWeapon.name: Krell Axe
meleeWeapon.description: Shock

meleeWeapon.name: Nightshade
meleeWeapon.description: Fast striking claws with a high Critical Hit Chance.Neutral Dodge grants the power  of Lifesteal.

meleeWeapon.name: Red Doe Staff
meleeWeapon.description: A magical stave rumored to contain a healing spirit within. Strikes with wide swings.

meleeWeapon.name: Spectral Blade
meleeWeapon.description: A super-heated laser sword with an infinitely sharp edge. Perfect for cutting... anything.

meleeWeapon.name: Stonebreaker
meleeWeapon.description: A massive Greatsword which contains the harnessed magic of a corrupted Guardian. Can summon small shockwaves.

meleeWeapon.name: Gas Giant
meleeWeapon.description: CORRODED

meleeWeapon.name: Godsplitter
meleeWeapon.description: An expertly balanced blade that is the produc of advanced Fae metallurgy.

meleeWeapon.name: Smolder
meleeWeapon.description: Ascorched blade imbued with FIRE.

meleeWeapon.name: World's Edge
meleeWeapon.description: A glowing Greatsword forged from shards of a shattered Worldstone. Chargeattacks cast waves.

longGun.name: AS-10 Bulldog
longGun.description: A brutal drum-fed fully-automatic 10 gauge shotgun designed for close-quarters combat.

longGun.name: Blackmaw AR-47
longGun.description: A fully automatic rifle with a medium capacity. Highly effective with controlled bursts.

longGun.name: Chicago Typewriter
longGun.description: A classic Tommy Gun with large ammo capacity and a slow reload. Poor initial accuracy which improves while holding down the trigger.

longGun.name: Coach Gun
longGun.description: A double-barrel over/under shotgun modified to fire powerful slugs. High damage with a decent fire rate, but very low magazine capacity.

longGun.name: Crossbow
longGun.description: An accurate and deadly single-shot crossbow with a low sound profile.

longGun.name: Ford's Scattergun
longGun.description: An incredibly powerful 12 gauge shotgun with a wide spread. High damage, slow reload.

longGun.name: Huntmaster M1
longGun.description: A powerful single-shot sniper rifle with excellent range and pinpoint accuracy. Comes with a 3x scope. Tap SCOPE to toggle.

longGun.name: Pulse Rifle
longGun.description: An extremely accurate, high-tech pulse rifle which shoots quick three-round bursts.

longGun.name: Royal Hunting Bow
longGun.description: The Postulant grants these to those who can defeat him. None know why. Some suspect that the game is mere preamble—that perhaps the true game is what its players do next.

longGun.name: Widowmaker
longGun.description: A powerful single-shot sniper rifle with excellent range and pinpoint accuracy. Comes with a 3x scope. Tap SCOPE to toggle.

longGun.name: Wrangler 1860
longGun.description: A well-rounded lever-action rifle effective at most ranges, hampered only by a slow reload.

longGun.name: XMG57 Bonesaw
longGun.description: An experimental infantry support weapon used for prolonged suppressive fire. High capacity, long reload, and prone to overheating. Becomes more accurate while holding down the trigger.

longGun.name: Aphelion
longGun.description: Fires a hypercharged wide-arcing line that passes through targets.

longGun.name: Deceit
longGun.description: A pinpoint accurate split-barreled rifle that fires two penetrating rails. High base damage, but cannot score Weakspot hits. Charge to fire

longGun.name: Nightfall
longGun.description: A device forged of pure evil. Fires hardened bone shards at bonus stagger. Semi-automatic with a medium kick.

longGun.name: Plasma Cutter
longGun.description: An energy-based cutting tool that increases damage when focused on a target. Can overheat.

longGun.name: Sagittarius
longGun.description: A high-powered Bow which deals bonus damage to Weakspots. Can be charged for increased effect. Perfect release after Charge for maximum damage

handGun.name: Cube Gun
handGun.description: Projectiles return on hit or after reaching max range. Reloading retrieves shot projectiles. Max 5 fired projectiles. Infinite Ammo. Can overheat.

handGun.name: Rune Pistol
handGun.description: A pistol infused with mysterious Fae magic. Rapidly fires 3-round bursts of energy. Trigger can be held to continuously fire.

handGun.name: Sorrow
handGun.description: The last vestiges of a fallen sister, this mystical crossbow pistol has the ability to recall its bolts to heal the wielder.

handGun.name: Star Shot
handGun.description: Fires a fast moving projectile which explodes on contact. Explosion has no damage falloff.

handGun.name: Bolt Driver
handGun.description: An ingenius Gul rifle designed to harness energy from Pan crystals. Charge to fire a 3- shot burst.

handGun.name: MP60-R
handGun.description: A small-caliber submachine gun best suited for close range skirmishes.

handGun.name: Repeater Pistol
handGun.description: An accurate semi-automatic pistol that can rapidly fire small-caliber bullets.

handGun.name: Rupture Cannon
handGun.description: A mid-range Pistol Shotgun with a brisk fire rate and medium recoil Slower reload.

handGun.name: Silverback Model 500
handGun.description: A powerful hand cannon witha low capacity cylinder. High damage and a heavy kick.

handGun.name: Sureshot
handGun.description: A high-caliber single-shot hunting pistol that inflicts heavy damage at mid to long range.

handGun.name: Tech 22
handGun.description: A suppressed small-caliber automatic pistol with medium magazine capacity and a high fire rate.

handGun.name: Service Pistol
handGun.description: Astandard issue military spec sidearm known for its reliability and accuracy.

amulet.description: Gain 7.5% to all damage dealt, 3% Movement Speed, and 5% all damage taken for each piece of unequipped armor.

amulet.name: Decayed Margin
amulet.description: Melee hits gain 1.5% base damage dealt as Lifesteal. For each 25% missing Health, gain 1.5% additional Melee Lifesteal. When Health is full, gain 25% Melee Damage.

amulet.name: Detonation Trigger
amulet.description: Increases Explosion damage by 25%. Explosions apply 405 BURNING damage over 5s.

amulet.name: Difference Engine
amulet.description: While a Shield is active, gain 20% damage and 1.5% of base dealt as Lifesteal.

amulet.name: Downward Spiral
amulet.description: Increase Fire Rate by 10% and Melee Attack Speed by 15%. For every missing 10% of Max Health, gain 3% Ranged Damage (Max 15%) and 4% Melee Damage (Max 20%).

amulet.name: Effigy Pendant
amulet.description: While Grey Health is present, gain 15% to all damage dealt, 10% damage reduction and 1 additional hit before Grey Health is removed.

amulet.name: Effluvium Enhancer
amulet.description: Increases ACID damage by 20% and CORROSIVE damage by 50%.

amulet.name: Emergency Switch
amulet.description: When below 50% health, chance to consume Relic on use is reduced by 35%. Final Relic Charge is not consumed on use, but effect cannot be triggered again for 60s.

amulet.name: Energized Neck Coil
amulet.description: Increases Status Effect damage by 25%. Applying a damaging Status Effect creates a 5m Explosion for 20% of the Status Effects full damage.

amulet.name: Energy Diverter
amulet.description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 10 Critical Chance and 15% to all damage dealt.

amulet.name: Escalation Protocol
amulet.description: Increases all damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after killing an enemy. Stacks 10x. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

amulet.name: Full Moon Circlet
amulet.description: Ranged damage Lifesteals 3% of base damage dealt. At full health, damage is increased by 20%.

amulet.name: Golden Ribbon
amulet.description: Increases Mod damage by 25%. Activating a MOD grants HASTE for 15s.

amulet.name: Gunfire Security Lanyard
amulet.description: Automatically reloads Magazine over time. Does not work for single shot weapons.

amulet.name: Gunslinger's Charm
amulet.description: Increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 20%.

amulet.name: Hallowed Egg
amulet.description: Spending at least 30% of Firearms magazine to deal damage increases Melee damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 5x.

amulet.name: Hyperconductor
amulet.description: Gain double Skill Charges. Increases Skill Cooldowns by 50% and reduces Max Power Generation by 15%.For Heavy Weapons, doubles Heavy Weapon Ammo instead.

amulet.name: Indignant Fetish
amulet.description: Taking damage from enemies increases all damage dealt by 25% and reduces all incoming damage by 10%. Lasts 20s.

amulet.name: Inert Overcharger
amulet.description: Standing still increases Fire Rate by 20%, Reload Speed by 15%, and reduces Recoil by 50%. Lasts 1.5s after moving.

amulet.name: Insulation Driver
amulet.description: While BULWARK is active, gain 15% to all damage dealt and HASTE.

amulet.name: Jester's Bell
amulet.description: Increases Mod and Skill Cast Speed by 35%. Casting a Skill or Mod increases all damage by 20% for 15s.

amulet.name: Kinetic Shield Exchanger
amulet.description: While a SHIELD is active, gain 25% Mod damage and generate 15% additional Mod power.

amulet.name: Kuri Kuri Charm
amulet.description: For every 10% of Health missing (Max 50%), gain 10% increased Relic Use Speed and 7% chance to not consume a Relic Charge.

amulet.name: Laemir Censer
amulet.description: Increases Mod Duration by 50%. Increases Mod Cost by 15%.

amulet.name: Leto's Amulet
amulet.description: Reduces Encumbrance by 40% and Stamina Cost by 15%.

amulet.name: Navigator's Pendant
amulet.description: Grants 20 Health, 20 Stamina, and -10 Armor Encumbrance.

amulet.name: Neckbone Necklace
amulet.description: Reduces the Damage of Status Effects applied to wearer by 50%. Gain 25% increased Damage when suffering from a Status Effect or Blight.

amulet.name: Necklace of Flowing Life
amulet.description: Increases Grey Health conversion by an additional 100%. When Grey Health Conversion triggers, gain 5x the amount as Mod Power.

amulet.name: Necklace of Supremacy
amulet.description: After 7s of not being damaged, increases all damage dealt by 15%. Increases to 25% if Health is full.

amulet.name: Nightmare Spiral
amulet.description: Gain 10% of base Ranged damage dealt as Lifesteal. Reduces Healing Effectiveness by 95%.

amulet.name: One True King Sigil
amulet.description: Increases Mod damage by 20%. Enhances the effect of Faerin's Sigil and Faelin's Sigil by 50% per Sigil equipped.

amulet.name: One-Eyed Joker Idol
amulet.description: Neutral Backdash creates a Magic Card lasting 1s. If Card absorbs enemy damage gain 25% Critical Chance for 5s. Neutral Backdash cost 30% additional Stamina.

amulet.name: Onyx Pendulum
amulet.description: Firearm damage adds stacks which increase the damage of stowed firearm by 2.5% for 15s. Stacks 10x.

amulet.name: Range Finder
amulet.description: After killing an enemy, gain 10% Ranged damage and 2m Firearm Range. Stacks 3x Lasts 10s. ranged Weakspot Hits will refresh duration.

amulet.name: Ravager's Mark
amulet.description: Increases all damage dealt to BLEEDING targets by 20%. Bonus increases to 30% for targets with 50% or lower Health.

amulet.name: Red Doe Sigil
amulet.description: Increases Relic Healing Effectiveness by 30% which doubles when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

amulet.name: Rusted Navigator's Pendant
amulet.description: Grants 15 Health, 15 Stamina, and -15 Armor Encumbrance.

amulet.name: Samoflange
amulet.description: Direct damage taken from enemies, and any additional damage within 2s, is reduced by 50%. Once the defensive buff expires, all incomig damage to wearer is increased by 15% for 10s.

amulet.name: Scavenger's Bauble
amulet.description: Increases Scrap pickups by 50%, Automatically pick up any nearby crafting materials.

amulet.name: Shaed Bloom Crystal
amulet.description: Gain a 30% damage bonus. Every 5s, the bonus switches between Physical and Elemental damage.

amulet.name: Shock Device
amulet.description: Increases SHOCK damage by 20% and OVERLOADED damage by 50%.

amulet.name: Silver Ribbon
amulet.description: Increases Skill damage by 25%.Activating a SKILL grants HASTE for 15s.

amulet.name: Soul Anchor
amulet.description: Summoning increases all damage dealt by 20% for 30s.

amulet.name: Spirit Wisp Amulet
amulet.description: Activating a Mod reduces current Skill Cooldowns by 3% for every 300 Mod Power spent.

amulet.name: Stalker's Brand
amulet.description: Gain 10% Ranged and 15% Melee damage. Bonus double versus enemies not targeting wearer.

amulet.name: Talisman of the Sun
amulet.description: Increases FIRE damage by 20% and BURNING damage by 50%.

amulet.name: Toxic Release Valve
amulet.description: Swapping Firearms releases a Toxic Cloud, which deals 148.5 ACID Damage to all enemies within 7m. and applies CORROSION. Can only happen once every 3s.

amulet.name: Twisted Idol
amulet.description: Increases Armor Effectiveness by 30% and reduces Encumbrance by 15.

amulet.name: Vengeance Idol
amulet.description: Increases all damage dealt by 30% when the wearer's Health is below 50%.

amulet.name: Void Idol
amulet.description: Increases Reload Speed by 20%. Reloads only require 50% of magazine from reserves to fully reload.

amulet.name: Weightless Weight
amulet.description: Increases Movement Speed by 0.75% and Reduces Stamina Costs of all actions by 0.75%  for every each 5 point of Armor Encumbrance.

amulet.name: Death's Embrace
amulet.description: Gain 20% to all damage when Health is below 100%. Gain HASTE when below 50% Health.

amulet.name: Matriarch's Insignia
amulet.description: Increases Melee Damage by 35% and causes all successful Melee Attacks to restore 10 Stamina.

amulet.name: Nightweaver's Grudge
amulet.description: Gain 20% Critical Chance and HASTE when within 15m of an entity suffering from a Status Effect.

amulet.name: Nimue's Ribbon
amulet.description: Increase Relic Healing Effectiveness by 50% Activating a Relic grants HASTE for 25s.

relic.name: Dragon Heart
relic.description: On use, heals 70 Health over 0.5s.

relic.name: Blooming Heart
relic.description: On use, heals the user for 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Spawns 3 Healing Orbs which grant 35% of caster's Max Health over 5s. Orbs last 20s. Recasting removes previous Orbs

relic.name: Crystal Heart
relic.description: On use, regenerates 100% of Max Health over 10s, Movement Speed is reduced by 50%, and incoming damage is reduced by 25%. Lasts 10s.

relic.name: Decayed Heart
relic.description: On use, causes the next 3 instances of enemy damage taken to trigger 40 Health regeneration over 3s. Lasts 30s.

relic.name: Enlarged Heart
relic.description: Innate double use speed. On use, heals 140 health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is halved.

relic.name: Lifeless Heart
relic.description: On use, heals 30 Health over 0.5s. Relic capacity is doubled

relic.name: Constrained Heart
relic.description: On use regenerates 20 Health per second for 5s and grants 2 Stacks of Bulwark while heal is active.

relic.name: Pulsing Heart
relic.description: On use, pulses every 3s, healing allies within 7m for 20 Health over 0.5s per pulse. Lasts 15s.

relic.name: Quilted Heart
relic.description: Does not provide standard healing. On use, negates Stamina Drain and cause Evades to heal for 15 Health over 0.25s. Lasts 20s.

relic.name: Reprocessed Heart
relic.description: On use, converts 5 Health to 40 Mod Power per second for 25s for Both Weapons. Cannot die from conversion.

relic.name: Resonating Heart
relic.description: On use, regenerates 50% of Max Health over 5s. When heal ends, any overhea| Health is Doubled and awarded over the next 20s.

relic.name: Ripened Heart
relic.description: On use, heals 35 Health over 0.5s and an additional 70 over 5s.

relic.name: Runed Heart
relic.description: On use, increases Health Regeneration by 5 and generates 500 Mod Power over 10s.

relic.name: Salvaged Heart
relic.description: Innate 50% Use Speed bonus. On use, heals 30 Health over 0.25s and restore 300% of current Grey Health.

relic.name: Shielded Heart
relic.description: On use, grants a Shield for 100% of Max Health. Lasts 20s or until Shield is removed by damage

relic.name: Siphon Heart
relic.description: On use, grants 10% of base damage dealt as Lifesteal for 10s.

relic.name: Tormented Heart
relic.description: Innate 20% Use Speed bonus. On use, deals 240 Explosive damage to enemies within 10m and Lifesteals 25% of damage dealt.

relic.name: Tranquil Heart
relic.description: Passively grants 2 Health Regeneration per second. On use, doubles All Health Regeneration for 15s.

relic.name: Unsullied Heart
relic.description: On use, heals for 100% of Current Health over 0.5s.

relic.name: Void Heart
relic.description: On use, reduces incoming damage by 50% for 4s. When buff ends, heals 100% of missing Health over 0.75s.

headArmor.name: Academic's Hat
headArmor.description: A soft and durable felt hat fashioned to stylize, not necessarily protect, the most important part of your body.

headArmor.name: Bruiser Helmet
headArmor.description: The visibility in this helmet leaves much to be desired, but that's not really the point. It goes a long way in keeping your head on your shoulders.

headArmor.name: Crown of the Red Prince
headArmor.description: A flashy, flame-hot diadem that demands respect and attention in equal measure...were there any subjects left to offer such sentiments.

headArmor.name: Dendroid Mask
headArmor.description: It's like putting your head inside the monsters you've been killing all this time. It's comfortable enough though, so long as you don't think about where it's been.

headArmor.name: Elder Headdress
headArmor.description: This headpiece hails from the wild and mysterious world of Yaesha. Its smooth,featureless. design is both eerie and elegant, painted a stark white and adornedwith luxuriant fur and imposing horns.

headArmor.name: Fae Royal Headcover
headArmor.description: It feels like you're not wearing any helmet at all - you'd swear you could even feel the wind in your hair. Yet it turns an arrow as effectively as any steel.

headArmor.name: Field Medic Hat
headArmor.description: While it may shield your eyes from the sun, it's not particularly protective against the dangers of the Root.

headArmor.name: Field Medic Mask
headArmor.description: This face covering protects you from contagions without obstructing your sight. You feel like a creature from another world in this thing. Perhaps that's fitting.

headArmor.name: High Noon Hat
headArmor.description: Something about this hat just feels right. Paired with a bandana, it keeps the sun and elements from hindering your all-important aim.

headArmor.name: Knotted Helm
headArmor.description: A hauntingly familiar visage, convincing enough to still be alive. To truly know your enemy, you must get inside its head. Literally.

headArmor.name: Labyrinth Headplate
headArmor.description: This helmet is reminiscent of a statue from a time long, long before.

headArmor.name: Leto Mark II Helmet
headArmor.description: While this ironclad helmet is somewhat difficult to breathe in, you feel secure knowing even the heaviest weapon would have little chance of cracking into your skull.

headArmor.name: Lodestone Crown
headArmor.description: This crown was worn by King Kolket himself. It could be heresy for a paxultek to wear such an artifact, but there are few left among the Pan who would even recognize it as their own.

headArmor.name: Navigator's Helm
headArmor.description: It's hard to imagine someone piloting an entire world, but that's who this helm was for. The sockets allowed them to speak with N'Erud directly. N'Erud had dozens of pilots, all working in concert-both with each other and with the world itself.

headArmor.name: Nightstalker Shroud
headArmor.description: A hunting mask with advanced respirator capabilities. It purifies yet does nothing to mask the stench of death that permeates the air.

headArmor.name: Radiant Visage
headArmor.description: The cowl is a striking blue, which contrasts with the large, featureless golden mask that covers the face of the wearer. This armor was highly coveted and only granted to those few who were recognized as the "Radiant Ones."

headArmor.name: Realmwalker Beret
headArmor.description: This hat once belonged to Founder Ford. He was only a captain then-a much younger Ford, from a long time and many lives ago.

headArmor.name: Red Widow Headdress
headArmor.description: The horns of this helmet are ornamental, designed to be displayed in addition to the Pan wearer's own horns-which themselves protrude from additional openings in the armor-to create a truly frightening visage.

headArmor.name: Space Worker Mask
headArmor.description: People (Mudtooth mostly) tell stories of how, before the Root, humans could fly into space. It's probably not true, but if it were, they'd need something like this to keep them alive out there.

headArmor.name: Technician Helmet
headArmor.description: An overwhelming amount of information shines within the helmet's display, the vast majority of it incomprehensible. Whether that's because it's a foreign language or the helmet has been damaged by whatever destroyed this place is anybody's guess.

headArmor.name: Trainer Cap
headArmor.description: For some reason, your head feels naked without this simple baseball cap with a fox logo. That aside, it keeps the sun out of your eyes, and that's all you ask of it.

headArmor.name: Void Skull
headArmor.description: The skull-like helm hails from the inhospitable world of Rhom, where survival demands more than just strength and cunning. Fashioned from a mysterious material, its surface glimmers with an otherworldly sheen that seems to shift and change with the light. Its sleek and angular lines, reminiscent of some alien technology, evoke a sense of unease in those who gaze upon it.

glove.name: Academic's Gloves
glove.description: The initials of the Dran who once owned these - and misplaged them often - are embroidered on the wool-lined inside.

glove.name: Bruiser Gloves
glove.description: These gauntlets are as tough as steel, as hard as stone, and up for whatever dangers or challenges come their way. They suit you well.

glove.name: Dendroid Grips
glove.description: Against all logic, these gloves feel natural. Like extensions of who you were meant to be. Seems like that should bother you more.

glove.name: Elder Gloves
glove.description: Features striking loops of gold that add an ornate touch to the otherwise plain design. Curiously, these embellishments are only present on the left-hand glove, making it stand out from its counterpart on the right.

glove.name: Fae Royal Vambraces
glove.description: Suitable for archery or swordplay - for killing of any sort really.

glove.name: Field Medic Gloves
glove.description: At a glance it's clear that these fingerless gloves won't keep you warm or offer much protection. Even still, you wear them because they provide improved grip without impacting precision.

glove.name: High Noon Armguards
glove.description: Metal arm guards paired with well-worn gloves that are more comfortable gripping a warm gun than reaching for a handshake. They're tasked with protecting your greatest asset - your trigger finger.

glove.name: Knotted Gloves
glove.description: The deadwood claws fit you almost too snug, making it difficult to remember where bark ends and your own flesh begins.

glove.name: Labyrinth Gauntlets
glove.description: Craggy, uneven stone melds tightly to your hands and forearms, as if the skin of something that once was has at last found new purchase.

glove.name: Leto Mark II Gloves
glove.description: These gauntlets are sturdy enough to hold up even agaist the Root: They're tough and intimidating while providing the bare-minimnum level of dexterity for,a steady grip on your weapon of choice. Just don't plan on completing any tasks that require subtlety when wearing these.

glove.name: Nightstalker Gloves
glove.description: A single glove and arm wrap are all you need or‘want for ar protection. The only defense you can truly rely on is a loaded gun and a cle shot.

glove.name: Radiant Bracers
glove.description: The fingerless leather gloves provide exceptional dexterity to the wearer, while the vambracers are adorned with a blue gem that gives the wearer acess to the volatile energy stored within.

glove.name: Realmwalker Gloves
glove.description: Ford's gloves were designed for warmth and dexterity. The soldier who wore these was not swinging blades or forging metal. He was pulling triggers and throwing grenades

glove.name: Red Widow Bracers
glove.description: These gloves are light, with openings for the fingers to allow the wearer maximum dexterity - a necesary consideration for traditional Pan weaponry.

glove.name: Space Worker Gloves
glove.description: Electromagnets are worked into the grip, activating automatically when the hand closes. Seems like a useful feature, so long as everything/you work with is metal.

glove.name: Survivor Gloves
glove.description: Made of durable leather and include a makeshift wrist guard consisting of a etalk plate secured by leather straps, providing addition protection to the wearer's wrists withour sacrificing dexterity.

glove.name: Technician Gloves
glove.description: A tingle runs across your palm within these gloves - like bugs skittering over your hand.

glove.name: Trainer Bracer
glove.description: An arm guard that also functions as a bite sleeve for training on the subtle nuances of when and who to bite.

glove.name: Void Wraps
glove.description: Crafted from an enigmatic substance that resembles hardened bone in appearance. These gloves are a powerful tool in the hands of those who would wield the void, drawing energy from the emptiness between worlds to unleash devastating attacks. But with great power comes great cost, and those who dare to wear these gloves must be prepared to pay the price.

bodyArmor.name: Academic's Overcoat
bodyArmor.description: Donning this uniform makes you feel a touch smarter, and you can't help but straighten the necktie whenever it slips loose.

bodyArmor.name: Bruiser Bodyplate
bodyArmor.description: This thing is difficult to put on or take off and makes you feel like afwalkipig ta In the thick of battle, that's exactly what you're looking for.

bodyArmor.name: Dendroid Chest
bodyArmor.description: Fibrous tentacles wrap themselves around your chest. Up until now, you've resolutely avoided this situation.

bodyArmor.name: Elder Raiment
bodyArmor.description: A distinctive piece of protective gear originating from Yaesha. Its vibrant red color and fur adornments make it stand out, serving as a symbol of the wearer's status and skill. While it may not provide as much protection as some other types of armor, its lightweight construction and flexible design allow for exceptional mobility and ease of movement in combat.

bodyArmor.name: Fae Royal Bodyplate
bodyArmor.description: The royal guard do not wear insignias on their chests nor crests on their shield. It is assumed their identify is clear from their grab and the confidence with wich they carry themselves.

bodyArmor.name: Field Medic Overcoat
bodyArmor.description: A long coat over a plate of armor. The metal could be thicker, sure, but your primary concern is safe and speedy travel to the wounded.

bodyArmor.name: High Noon Duds
bodyArmor.description: A rugged amalgamation of canvas, denim, leather, and steel. These different materials all serve the same purpose of keeping you covered without inhibitin aiming mobility.

bodyArmor.name: Knotted Cage
bodyArmor.description: Tightly coiled bark shrouds you like a second ribcage. Its embrace is surprisingly-and frighteningly-comforting.

bodyArmor.name: Labyrinth Mantle
bodyArmor.description: Though the cloth and tassels possess a seemingly primitive design, the pure energy wracking down your spine reminds you otherwise.

bodyArmor.name: Leto Mark II Armor
bodyArmor.description: A masterpiece of impenetrability. Even though quick maneuvering is near impossible in this metal behemoth, you can't help but be impressed by the ingenuity of the design and the inspired craftsmanship.

bodyArmor.name: Nightstalker Garb
bodyArmor.description: This old coat is shabby, but who's really looking? The wealth of interior ammunition pockets more than makes up for it.

bodyArmor.name: Radiant Protector
bodyArmor.description: A dazzling sight, its golden surface featuring a stunning sun burst pattern etched into the chest. Adorned with blue gems embedded in the shoulders this armor is fit for only the most esteemed members of the Laemir

bodyArmor.name: Realmwalker Tunic
bodyArmor.description: It's not even frayed. How is that possible? Unless the World Stones did the same thing to Ford's clothes as they did to Ford himself.

bodyArmor.name: Red Widow Raiment
bodyArmor.description: This chestpiece must be hundreds -thousands- of years old, yet it shows no signi of rust or decay. One can only imagine a Pan king or queen wearing such  majestic regalia.

bodyArmor.name: Space Worker Body
bodyArmor.description: It's made of some material you don't recognize - thick but highly pliable, did the Drzyr expect to get struck by out there?

bodyArmor.name: Survivor Overcoat
bodyArmor.description: A combination of a sturdy metal chest plate and a worn, leather trench coat that provides some protection against the elements. It's clear that the ari together with practicality in mind, rather than aesthetics.

bodyArmor.name: Technician Bodyplate
bodyArmor.description: The Xul were engineers and builders, but this armor was made to withstand a grenade blast. Was this built for safety or something else?

bodyArmor.name: Trainer Clothes
bodyArmor.description: This isn't just any denim jacket, it's your denim jacket. It's not especial pdale. 7 ready, but it's comfortable, and in it you feel ready for anything. y, p If

bodyArmor.name: Void Carapace
bodyArmor.description: Crafted from the same mysterious material as the Void gloves, helm, and greaves, the chest armor completes the set's unsettling aesthetic. Its angular design is both practical and intimidating, providing unparalleled protection against the deadly environments and creatures of Rhom.

legArmor.name: Academic's Trousers
legArmor.description: Expensive-looking shoes fit for a lecture hall...that wouldn't last a week outsid it.

legArmor.name: Bruiser Boots
legArmor.description: While they're not exactly aesthetic, you're more comfortable in twice-temper steel and repurposed tire tread than you care to admit.

legArmor.name: Dendroid Leggings
legArmor.description: The deadwood boots are surprisingly snug. You're not sure what you expecte shodding your feet inside the bloodthirsty branches of the Root, but it wasn't this cushioned comfort.

legArmor.name: Elder Leggings
legArmor.description: Designed for both form and function. Made from durable yet lightweight materials, they allow for a full range of movement and flexibility in combat.

legArmor.name: Fae Royal Greaves
legArmor.description: Although apparently made of steel, they feel lighter than any boots you've eve worn. No... you feel lighter when wearing them.

legArmor.name: Field Medic Trousers
legArmor.description: With an assortment of pockets, pouches, and loops for your various concoctioy you're essentially a walking apothecary.

legArmor.name: High Noon Soles
legArmor.description: Durable pants with spurred boots and a strip of leather for a belt. The only accent is an imposing skull on the belt buckle, a constant reminder that death is always lurking in the shadows.

legArmor.name: Knotted Greaves
legArmor.description: These boots are surprisingly light and agile, carrying you through foliage and bramble with ease. They seem to know where to go before you even lift you foot.

legArmor.name: Labyrinth Treads
legArmor.description: The grime of a thousand different worlds mars the side of boots that walk in one place where all paths converge.

legArmor.name: Leto Mark II Leggings
legArmor.description: Strong yet streamlined. Practical yet aesthetic. Although you can't expect to make a quick getaway in these, they're just what you need to stand strong against the looming threat of destruction. The care and attention to detail t| went into them is something to behold.

legArmor.name: Nightstalker Pants
legArmor.description: Thin shoes that fit perfectly and feel like they practically disappear on your feet. They're ideal for stealthy maneuvering while stalking your prey.

legArmor.name: Radiant Greaves
legArmor.description: Gleaming golden plates overlap and protect the wearer's feet and shins. Originally designed to be worn by the Pan, it's impressive how the armor can be adapted to fit human proportions without sacrificing its durability or protective properties.

legArmor.name: Realmwalker Pantaloons
legArmor.description: There is hardly a world where these boots haven't tread.

legArmor.name: Red Widow Leggings
legArmor.description: Even though this armor was designed to be worn by a Pan warrior, you are still able wear it and benefit from its protection.

legArmor.name: Space Worker Legs
legArmor.description: The magnets in the boots are far stronger than those in the gloves. It's unclear how they know when to activate, but they do so on their own. Massive as N'Erud is, it must not provide enough gravity to ensure its workers remain attached to...

legArmor.name: Survivor Leggings
legArmor.description: Provides minimal protection, but serve the purpose of covering up skin to prevent minor cuts and scrapes while trekking through rough terrain.

legArmor.name: Technician Greaves
legArmor.description: Designed for stability rather than speed. Plant your weight in these things, and you'd be very difficult to move.

legArmor.name: Trainer Workboots
legArmor.description: Durable pants that are used to handling more than a little dirt and fur. The canteen is for your companion, while the flask is all yours.

legArmor.name: Void Greaves
legArmor.description: A sturdy pair of footwear, expertly crafted from the same unknown material the other Void armor pieces. Their angular design and jagged edges give their wearer an intimidating and fearsome look. But these boots are more than fashion statement-they provided unparalleled protection and stability in the treacherous environments of Rhom.

traits.name: Kinship
traits.description: Reduces Friendly Fire damage dealt and received

traits.name: Arcane Strike
traits.description: Increases Mod Power Generation from Melee Damage

traits.name: Blood Bond
traits.description: Archetype Summons absorb X% of damage taken by the caster

traits.name: Glutton
traits.description: Increases the Use Speed of Consumables and Relics

traits.name: Revivalist
traits.description: Increases the Speed of Reviving and being Revived

traits.name: Rugged
traits.description: Increases the Health of Archetype Summons

traits.name: Shadeskin
traits.description: Increases Resistance to Elemental Status Effect Damage

traits.name: Wayfarer
traits.description: Increases Enviroment Movement Speed (Vaulting, Ladders, Wading)

skills.name: Attack Dog
skills.description: Companion will follow the Handler and deal 20% additional damage. SINGLE PRESS: Compabion engages enemies near the targeted location. DOUBLE TAP: Companion returns to the Handler and remains by their side. HOLD: Howl increases damage by 20% for all allies within 20m. Lasts 20s.Cooldown: 90s

skills.name: Bulletstorm
skills.description: Unleashes the full power and speed of the Gunslinger. Increases Fire Rate 20% and Reload Speed 50% of all ranged weapons. Lasts 20s. Single Shot Weapons become fully-automatic. Kills instantly reload the current weapon. Instead of becoming fully-automatic, Bows and Crossbows gain 15% Critical Chance and 50% incresed Projectile Speed.Cooldown: 57.6s

skills.name: Fortune Hunter
skills.description: Increases the Explorer's treasure sense to reveal special items within 40m for all allies. Lasts 60s.Cooldown: 90s

skills.name: Gold Digger
skills.description: Dig into the ground to spring a fountain which grants a random buff. Fountains last 45s and their buffs last 20s.Fountains can grant either: 10% increased damage, 15% damage reduction, 2 Health Regeneration per second, or HASTE.Cooldown: 45s

skills.name: Guard Dog
skills.description: Companion will follow the Handler and generate 15% incresed Threat while attacking. All damage to them is reduced by 20%. SINGLE PRESS: Companion engages enemies near the targeted location.DOUBLE TAP: Companion returns to the Handler and remains by their side. HOLD: Howl reduces damage by 15% to all allies within 20m and the Companion generates additional Threat. Lasts 20s.Cooldown: 90s

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: The Medic Quickly expels healing energy to SHIELD all allies within 25m for 100% of their Max Health for 10s. While shielded, allies regenerate 21% of their Max Health over the duration. Cooldown: 96s

skills.name: Hunter's Focus
skills.description: Continously Aiming Down Sights uninterrupted and without shooting for 1s causes the Hunter to enter a FOCUSED state. FOCUSED reduces Weapon Spread, Recoil, and Sway by 75% and grants 25% Ranged & Ranged Weaspot Damage, and 10% Ranged Crit Chance.

skills.name: Hunter's Mark
skills.description: Increases the Hunter's spatial awareness by casting an Aura that automatically applies MARK to all enemies within 35m. While senses are heightened, Hunter also gains 15% increased Ragend and Melee damage. Lasts 25s.Cooldown: 70sMARK: Crit Chance against MARKED enemies is increased by 15% for all allies.

skills.name: Hunter's Shroud
skills.description: Hunter becomes Shrouded, reducing enemy awareness and making them harder to hit while moving. Attacking or activating a Mod or Skill will instantly exit Shroud.Exiting Shroud applies MARK to all enemies within 10m and grants AMBUSH to the Hunter for 2s. AMBUSH: Increases Ranged and Melee Damage by 50% which diminishes over its duration. Ranged and Melee attacks apply MARK.Hunter will automatically Shorud again after 1.15s if no offensive action are performed. Lasts 15s.Coolown: 86.4sMARK: Crit Chance against MARKED enemies is increased by 15% for all allies

skills.name: Juggernaut
skills.description: Become nearly unstoppable, gaining 3 Stack of BULWARK, 15% increased Movement and Melee Speed, and 50% increased Melee damage. Stagger Level reduced by 1. Lasts 25s.Cooldown: 60s

skills.name: Minion: Flyer
skills.description: PRESS: Summons a Root Flyer Minion to fight by your side. Costs 10% of Max Health to summon, but will not kil Summoner. Max (2).HOLD: SACRIFICE all Root Flyer Minions, dealing 50 damage within 3m and spawning 3 homing projectiles which explode on contact for 150 damage eachCooldown: 45s

skills.name: Minion: Hollow
skills.description: PRESS: Summons a Root Hollow Minion to fight by your side. Costs 15% of Max Health to summon, but will not kil Summoner. Max (2)HOLD: SACRIFICE Root Hollow Minion to explode, dealing 150 damage within 5m. Reduces Skill Cooldown by up to 50% based on remaining Health of each Minion Sacrificied.Cooldown: 30s

skills.name: Minion: Reaver
skills.description: PRESS: Summons a Root Reaver Minion to fight by your side. Costs 35% of Max Health to summon, but will not kill Summoner. Max (1).HOLD: SACRIFICE all Root Reaver Minion, dealing 200 damage within 6m and spawning Spore Bombs which bounce and explode on contact for 200 damage each.Reduces Skill Cooldown by up to 50% based on remaining Health of Minion.Cooldown: 120s

skills.name: Plainswalker
skills.description: Increases movement speed by 20% and reduces Stamina Cost by 80% for all allies. Lasts 30s. Cooldown: 60s

skills.name: Quick Draw
skills.description: Pull out your trusty side piece and unload up to 6 Critical Shots from the hip. Each shot deals 35 base damage and double stagger value. PRESS: Instantly fires towards all enemies in view within 25m. Upon release, rounds will be divided evenly among all targets.HOLD & RELEASE: Allows manual Aim and fires one single powerful shot upon release.Cooldown: 38.4s

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Enters a heightened state of battle which increases Fire Rate by 15%, Reload Speed by 20%, and Movement Speed by 10%. Lasts 10s. Kills and dealing significant damage grant 1 Stack of RAGE which increases Ranged Damage by 2.5% per Stack. Upon reaching 10 Stacks, the CHallenger goes BERSERK, which reloads their current firearm and doubles Rampage efects for 15s.Cooldown: 90s

skills.name: Redemption
skills.description: The Medic unleashes a 30m shockwave that revives downed allies and resotres 52.5% Max Health over 10s. For each additional 1s holding the SKILL button, the heal gains an additional 52.5% (up to 210% max)Revived allies will only receive 50% of the healing amount. If revived, allies cannot be revived again by Redemption for another 180s. Resets at Wordstone or on death. Cooldwon: 115.2s

skills.name: Sidewinder
skills.description: Calls upon the power of the Desert Sidewinder snake to increase ADS Movement Speed and Draw/Swap Spped by 50%. Cycling weapons will automatically reload incoming Firearms. Lasts 12s.Cooldown: 76.8s

skills.name: Support Dog
skills.description: Companion will follow the Handler and continuously heal allies within 3.5m for 0.25% of Max Health per second. SINGLE PRESS: Companion engages enemies near the targeted location. DOUBLE TAP: Companion returns to the Handler and remains by their side.HOLD: Howl grants 2% of Max Health per second and 25% increased Movemente Speed to all allies within 20m. Lasts 25sCooldown: 90s

skills.name: Vial: Elixir Of Life
skills.description: Creates a mysterious vapor cloud that lasts 10s and applies LIVING WILL.LIVING WILL grants 5 Health Regeneration per second, and automatically protects against fatal damage while active. Can revive downed players if it heals them to full when downed. Lasts 20s.Revived allies canno be affected by Living Will for 180s.PRESS: Slam Vial on the ground, creating the effect at the Alchemist's feet.HOLD & RELEASE: Aim and throw the Vial causing the same effect where it lands. Cooldown: 86.4s.

skills.name: Vial: Frenzy Dust
skills.description: Creates a mysterious vapor cloud which lasts 10s and applies FRENZIED.FRENZlED increases Fire Rate, Reload Speed, and Melee Speed by 20%, and Movement Speed by 15%. Lasts 15s.PRESS: Slam Vial on the ground, creating the effect at the Alchemist's feet.HOLD & RELEASE: Aim and throw the Vial causing the same effect where it lands. Cooldown: 72s

skills.name: Vial: Stone Mist
skills.description: Creates a mysterious vapor cloud which lasts 10s and applies STONESKIN.STONESKIN reduces incoming damage by 25%, greatly increases Blight Buildup Decay Rate, reduces Stagger by l, and makes the target immune to Status Effects. Lasts 15s.PRESS: Slam Vial on the ground, creating the effect at the Alchemist's feet.HOLD & RELEASE: Aim and throw the Vial causing the same effect where it lands. Cooldown: 72s

skills.name: War Stomp
skills.description: Creates a high impact tremor that deals 150 damage and additional stagger in a forward cone up to 7.5m. Deals damage in all directions at point blank range. Cooldown: 50s

skills.name: Wellspring
skills.description: The Medic channels healing energy into their fist, punching a hole in the ground to create a 3m Healing Spring AOE wich restores 10.5 Health per second and greatly increses Blight Decay Rate. Lasts 15s.Cooldown: 57.6s

skills.name: Reboot
skills.description: Initiates a Data Backup of the caster's current Health, Stamina, Relic Charges, Ammo, and Negative Status Effects, which are stored for 30s.While the Backup is active, increases Movement Speed by 15% and Damage Reduction by 10%.Reactivating the Skill restores all saved values from the Backup and spawns a Decoy which lasts 3s.Cooldown: 55s

skills.name: Void Cloak
skills.description: Automatically Perfect Dodge incoming direct damage for 60s. Each auto-evade reduces timer by 33% - 100% based on damage absorbed nd , spawns a Decoy for 3s.Cooldown: 75s

skills.name: Worm Hole
skills.description: Warps the caster forward through space-time. The next Melee or Ranged attack within 5s will deal 300% damage.Holding the Skill button will show the targeting device. If an enemy is directly targeted, the caster will emerge behind them.  Cooldwon: 35s

skills.name: Heavy Weapon: Flamethrower
skills.description: PRESS: Deploys a Flamethrower turret which lasts until its Ammo is exhausted. Turrets that can aim will prioritze targts taht the player Aims at. Press SKILL again to enable autonomous targeting.HOLD: Deploys to Heavy Carry Mode. If Engineer Prime is available, will Overclock the weapon if already in hand or on the battlefield.DOUBLE PRESS: The weapon is reclaimed, returning 75% of its remaining ammoHeavy weapon ammo is regenered by 1.02% every second, and heavy weapons can only be deployed if at least 25% ammo is available.

skills.name: Heavy Weapon: Impact Cannon
skills.description: PRESS: Deploys a Impact Cannon Turret which lasts until its Ammo is exhausted. Turrets that can aim will prioritze targts taht the player Aims at. Press SKILL again to enable autonomous targeting.HOLD: Deploys to Heavy Carry Mode. If Engineer Prime is available, will Overclock the weapon if already in hand or on the battlefield.DOUBLE PRESS: The weapon is reclaimed, returning 75% of its remaining ammo.Heavy weapon ammo is regenered by 1.02% every second, and heavy weapons can only be deployed if at least 25% ammo is available.

skills.name: Heavy Weapon: Vulcan
skills.description: PRESS: Deploys a Vulcan Turret which lasts until its Ammo is exhausted. Turrets that can aim will prioritize targets that the player Aims at. Press SKILL again to enable autonomous targeting.  HOLD: Deploys to Heavv Carry Mode. If Engineer Prime is available, will Overlock the weapon if already in hand or on the battlefieldDOUBLE PRESS: The weapon is reclaimed, returning 75% of its remaining ammo.Heavy weapon ammo is regenered by 1.02% every second, and heavy weapons can only be deployed if at least 25% ammo is available.

skills.name: Reality Rune
skills.description: Conjures a 7m protective dome which applies SLOW to any enemy or enemy projectiles.  Allies inside gain 25% Damage Reduction. Lasts 15s.Cooldown: 75s

skills.name: Chaos Gate
skills.description: Conjures a 7m unstable zone which grants allies a 15% to all Damage Dealt, 25% increased Mod Generation, but increases the damage that allies take by 15%. Lasts 20s.Cooldown: 85s

skills.name: Havoc Form
skills.description: Unleashes the powers of the  Labyrinth to empower the caster with new abilities. Lasts 30s. Duration is reduced when Havoc Form special abilities are used.FIRE: Blasts Lightning Tendrils from the Archon's hand, dealing 84.2 SHOCK Damage per second to targets within 15m.AIM: Raises a 3m Energy Shield which deals 35 SHOCK damage per second and reduces incoming damage to all allies by 50%.DODGE: Performs a Blink Evade that deals 100 SHOCK damage to enemies within 3m.Cooldown: 120s

weaponMods.name: Astral Burst
weaponMods.description: Fires a short range burst of 7 star fragments which deal 35 damage each. Fragments bounce off walls up to 3 times, dealing 35% additional damage per bounce. Weakspot hits deal reduced damage. Mod Power Requirement: 450

weaponMods.name: Athibar
weaponMods.description: Charge attacks use 25 stamina to throw the spear, which returns to the wielder's hand. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Beta Ray
weaponMods.description: Brands a target for 30s. Branded enemies that die leave a Brand at their location.Reloading or Swapping detonates Brands dealing 225 damage.Addiotional Brands (3 Max) on the same target deal 50% damage.Salin enemies return 5-15% of Ammo and Mod power to the weapon.  Mod Power Requirement: 450

weaponMods.name: Beyond The Veil
weaponMods.description: Neutral Evade turns to mist, granting Nightshade 5% base damage as Lifesteal for 5s. Perfect Dodge doubles duration. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Big Bang
weaponMods.description: Funnels all current Mod Charges into the next shot. Projectiles deal 65 direct damage and 65 Explosive damage in a 5m per Charge consumed. Explosion applies 75 BURNING damage over 10s per Charge consumed. Additional Charges consumed increase all damage by 5%. Max 5 Charges Mod Power Requirement:  630

weaponMods.name: Blood Draw
weaponMods.description: Shoots out razor-sharp Chain Shards which impale up to 5 targets within 15m, dealing 10 damage. On hit, chains are pulled towards the caster, dealing 250 damage split equally among enemies and applying 275 BLEEDING damage over 15s. Mod Power Requirement: 450

weaponMods.name: Bloodline
weaponMods.description: Fires a devastating blast which penetrates through all enemies in its path. Deals 120 damage with a 25% Critical damage bonus, and 2x additional stagger. Bloodline daage increases by 50% for each enemy penetrated. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Bloodthirst
weaponMods.description: Damage increases by +25% against BLEEDING enemies, and +25% when attacking from behind. Charge Attacks deal 100 BLEEDING damage over 10s Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Bore
weaponMods.description: Fires a drill projectile which bores into enemies on contact, dealing 80 damage. After fully burrowing into an enemy, creates a Weakspot which grants 50% of normal Weakspot Damage on hit. If attached to an existing Weakspot, Ranged Crit Chance is increased by 15% when attacking the drill. Lasts 6s. Mod Power Requirement: 500

weaponMods.name: Chaos Driver
weaponMods.description: Drives electrified rods which tether to other rods within 10m. Tethers deal 20 SHOCK damage per second. Targets embedded with a rod take 20 SHOCK damage per second. They take 20% additionally damage per extra rod in the target. Damage is increased by 1.5% if linked to another rod. Rods in the same target will not link. Mod Power Requirement: 450

weaponMods.name: Concussive Shot
weaponMods.description: Fires a focused blast of air through all targets within 8m, dealing 155 damage and 5x impact. Mod Power Requirement: 500

weaponMods.name: Corrosive Rounds
weaponMods.description: Imbues ammunition with TOXIC and increases Range Crit Chance by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply CORRODED, dealing 100 damage over 10s. Mod Power Requirement: 1250

weaponMods.name: Cube Shield
weaponMods.description: Cube Shield Generates a Cube Shield which absorbs up to 500 damage from incoming enemy projectiles. Lasts 15s.Reactivating fires the Cube Shield which damages enemies as is travels. Damage is increased if the Cube Shield has absorbed enemy projectile damage before firing. Mod Power Requirement: 1,000

weaponMods.name: Death Sentence
weaponMods.description: Dealing Melee Damage 6 times over 10s empowers Feral Judgement. When empowered, Neutral Backdash Charge Attacks apply Death Sentence. After 1.5s of being sentenced, the enemy will suffer 10 Phantom Strikes, dealing X25 Damage each. Deals 25% additional damage to BLEEDING enemies. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Defrag
weaponMods.description: Infects weapon with Malware for 30s, causing shots to apply FRAGMENTED for 5s. When a FRAGMENTED enemy dies, they create a Glitch that lasts 15s.Picking up a Glitch increases All damage by 20% for 15s. Destroying a Glitch causes it to destabilize, creating a 5m Virus Pool which deals 25 damage per second and applies the FRAGMENTED debuff to enemies inside. Virus Pools last 15s. Mod Power Requirement: 1500

weaponMods.name: Dreadwalker
weaponMods.description: Enter the Nightmare Realm. Nightfall gains infinite Ammo, a 25% Fire Rate increase, 10% Lifesteal, and becomes fully automatic. The wielder becomes significatly harder to hit while moving. Disables other weapons and Skills for the duration, or until Dreadwalker is deactivated. Lasts 10s. Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

weaponMods.name: Dreamwave
weaponMods.description: After dealing 250 damage, Charge Attack will release a Dreamwave, flowing outwards 20m and returning to caster. Dreamwave applies SLOW to all enemies for 10s and grants a Stack of REVERIE for each enemy affected. Each Stack grants +2% to All Damage and +2% Movement Speed, which lasts 15s. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Energy Wall
weaponMods.description: Deploys an energy barrier on impact with ground. Allies can shoot through Energy Wall but enemy projectiles are absorbed (up to 500 damage received). Max 1 Wall at a time. Lasts 30s. Mod Power Requirement: 500

weaponMods.name: Energy Wave
weaponMods.description: Charge attacks use 35 stamina to release an energy wave projectile allowing the wielder to strike enemies from much farther away. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Eulogy
weaponMods.description: Recalls bots which deal 30 damage when pulled from a target and when striking targets on their return. Recalled bolts grant 2% of Max HP. Recalled bolts can also overfill Sorrow by up to +5. Any additional bolts will be returned to reserves. Mod Power Requirement: 600

weaponMods.name: Explosive Shot
weaponMods.description: Fires an explosive round that deals up to 155 damage within 9m. Mod Power Requirement: 650

weaponMods.name: Familiar
weaponMods.description: Summons Faerie Familiar to aid in combat. The Familiar selects a random enemy within 10m and slashes through them for 25 damage each attack. Familiar will select a new target when the previous one dies. Lasts 15s. Mod Power Requirement: 1,000

weaponMods.name: Fargazer
weaponMods.description: Calls forth an eye of Legion to gaze at player's AIM target. For every 0.25s Fargazer focuses on a target within 25m, a stack of MADNESS Status is applied for 5s. Each stack deals 3.3 Damage per second. Max 10 stacks. Lasts 30s. Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

weaponMods.name: Faultline
weaponMods.description: Charge to fire off ground-based shockwaves which deal 115 damage. Costs 35 Stamina Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Firestorm
weaponMods.description: Creates a whirling cyclone that sucks in nearby targets and applies BURNING for 10s. The center of the cyclone deals 75 FIRE damage per second. Lasts 15s. Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

weaponMods.name: Fission Strike
weaponMods.description: On Neutral Evade Attacks Atom Splitter achieves Nuclear Fission, releasing a wave of charged particles which deals 151.5 Damage to targets within 10m. Charged Neutral Evade Attacks increase range by 3x and Damage by 25% Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Fracture
weaponMods.description: Charge Attacks taint the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Godsplitter to register as Weakspot hits for 3s seconds. Duration increases with additional fragments. Max 35s. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Guardian's Call
weaponMods.description: Calls down a Guardian Sword on enemies struck by an Energy Disc. Swords deal 100 damage and 3x stagger within 5m. Mod Power Requirement: 750

weaponMods.name: Healing Shot
weaponMods.description: Launches a payload that explodes on contact with allies, healing 30% of their max health. When no ally is struck, payload lays dormant until an ally gets close. Dormant payload lasts 30s, slowly losing healing potency over time. Mod Power Requirement: 600

weaponMods.name: Heat Sink
weaponMods.description: Forces open Plasma Cutter's heat vents dispersing all heat. While active, Plasma Cutter generates 50% less heat, and ramping damage cap is increased to 3x Damage. Overheats automatically when deactivated. Lasts 20s. Mod Power Requirement: 850

weaponMods.name: Helix
weaponMods.description: Shoots a helix of missiles, dealing 120 damage. On contact, divides into 6 smaller rockets which seek additional targets, dealing 30 damage on contact. Mod Power Requirement: 850

weaponMods.name: Hot Shot
weaponMods.description: Imbues ammunition with FIRE and increases Ranged damage by 15% for 20s. Shots also apply BURNING, dealing 200 FIRE Damage over 10 seconds. Mod Power Requirement: 1250

weaponMods.name: Krell Edge
weaponMods.description: Charge to throw the Krell Axe which applies OVERLOAD on hit, dealing 50 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 10s. Shortly after throwing, another will appear in the wielders hand. Costs 25 Stamina Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Lifeline
weaponMods.description: After dealing 250 damage, the next charge attack causes the spirit of the RED DOE to stampede forward, dealing 160 damage to enemies and regenerating 10% Health to allies in its path. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Moonlight Barrage
weaponMods.description: Empowers the Bow for 15s. Arrows apply Moonlight to enemies for 3s. Enemies struck by Crescent Moon while Moonlit release a Moon Essence which returns 1 arrow, heals 5% of Max Health, and grants 15% Fire and Reload Speed for 5s. Basic Shots automatically become Charged Shots. Manually Charged Shots fire two arrows.  Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

weaponMods.name: Nano Swarm
weaponMods.description: Unleash a swarm of Nanomachines that seek after enemies within 20 meters and repeatedly attack dealing 6 ACID damage per hit. Lasts 15 seconds Mod Power Requirement: 750

weaponMods.name: Ouroboros
weaponMods.description: Conjures 3 sword fragments that encircle the wielder for 30s. Performing a Melee Attacks lets loose a Fragment which taints the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Deceit to register as Weaspot hits for a short period of time. Charge Melee attack fires all remaining Fragments at once. Mod Power Requirement: 1,440

weaponMods.name: Overflow
weaponMods.description: Imbues ammunition with SHOCK and increases Fire Rate by 15% and Reload Speed by 15% for 20 seconds. Shots also apply OVERLOADED, dealing 35 SHOCK Damage every 5s for 15s. Mod Power Requirement: 1,250

weaponMods.name: Prismatic Driver
weaponMods.description: Fires a superheated beam which deals 25 Mod Damage per second. Sustaining the beam on a target causes an explosion which deals 150 Mod damage in a 3m AOE. Mod Power Requirement: 50 per Pulse.

weaponMods.name: Root Blades
weaponMods.description: Fires a volley of Root Blades in an arc which each deal 25 Damage and apply 200 BLEEDING damage over 10s Mod Power Requirement: 750

weaponMods.name: Rootlash
weaponMods.description: Launches a projectile which summons a Root Tentacle. Tentacles deal 30 damage and steal 1.5% of the hero's Max Health per hit. Lasts 20s. (Max 2) Mod Power Requirement: 450

weaponMods.name: Rotted Arrow
weaponMods.description: Fires a rotten arrow that deals 20 damage and detonates for another 60 damage within 4m. A deadly gas cloud is left behind that deals 200 damage over 5s. Mod Power Requirement: 400

weaponMods.name: Scrap Shot
weaponMods.description: Fires a caltrops grenade that explodes to cover an area of 6m. Caltrops deal 20 damage per second and SLOW to enemies that walk over them. Lasts 10s. Mod Power Requirement: 750

weaponMods.name: Screamer
weaponMods.description: Fire a high-powered rocket that deals up to 200 damage within 2.5m. Mod Power Requirement: 400

weaponMods.name: Skewer
weaponMods.description: Fires a Wretched Spear which embeds itself on contact. Spears deal 125 damage on hit, rapidly dividing inside the target until bursting, dealing 140 damage to all targets within 3m. Spears embedded in the environment remain in place for 10s. Mod Power Requirement: 850

weaponMods.name: Song of Eafir
weaponMods.description: Fires a shot infused with the binding power of the Song of Eafir. Staggers most ground enemies within 10m and deals 150 damage to Flying enemies within the same range.The song continues for 15s, afflicting targets within 15m with SLOW, and a 15% decrease to damage dealt. Mod Power Requirement: 1000

weaponMods.name: Soul Brand
weaponMods.description: Applies a Soul Brand to all enemies within 25m which lasts 25s. Enemies killed while bearing the Soul Brand leave behind an Echo which lasts 10s before returning to the Nightmare Realm. Echoes are drawn to any survivor who walks within 3m, granting 10% of Max Health on contact. Mod Power Requirement: 850

weaponMods.name: Soulbinder
weaponMods.description: Fires a projectile that attaches to the enemy dealing 40 damage. Enemies within 7m become bound to the primary target after impact and share 60% of damage dealt to them. Lasts 15s. Mod Power Requirement: 650

weaponMods.name: Space Crabs
weaponMods.description: Launch an alien egg that bursts on impact, releasing 5 Space Crabs. Crabs follow the caster, leaping towards enemies within 4m, and exploding, dealing 60 Damage each. Mod Power Requirement: 450

weaponMods.name: Starfall
weaponMods.description: Fires a powerful arrow which deals 30 damage and opens a 7m portal that rains down star fragments. Each fragment deals 50 damage within 4m. Lasts 6s. Mod Power Requirement: 750

weaponMods.name: Stasis Beam
weaponMods.description: Fires a beam which deals 15 damage per second, and applies SLOW Debuff. After 3s of application to a target, SLOW becomes STASIS, freezing the target in place for 10s. Mod Power Requirement: 50 per Pulse.

weaponMods.name: Supernova
weaponMods.description: Fires the compressed remains of a dying star. On contact or hit wit the primary fire, causes Supernova to explode for 150 FIRE Damage, and 350 BURNING Damage over 10s to all targets within 4m.Striking the Supernova with Aphelion's primary fire increases its explosion radius by 25% and damage by 50%, and spawns a massive shockwave that deals 300 FIRE damage and also applies the initial BURNING amount. Mod Power Requirement: 400

weaponMods.name: Time Lapse
weaponMods.description: Creates a 6m blast which freezes all standard enemies for 7s. Dealing damage to frozen enemies immediately breaks the Time Lapse effect, applying SLOW for the remaining duration. Mod Power Requirement: 1,000

weaponMods.name: Tremor
weaponMods.description: Fires a projectile that cracks the ground and spawns shockwaves that deal 75 damage Within 9m for 6s. Shockwaves inflict 3x impact. Mod Power Requirement: 900

weaponMods.name: Voltaic Rondure
weaponMods.description: Launches a slow-moving orb that pulses every 0.5s, striking enemies within 3m for 20 SHOCK damage and applying OVERLOADED for 15s. The orb lasts 20s. The orb can be overcharged by striking it with additional damage. Mod Power Requirement: 850

weaponMods.name: Whirlwind
weaponMods.description: Neutral Backdash Charge creates a Whirlwind of slashes which strike all enemies within 8m for 75 damage. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Witchfire
weaponMods.description: Fires a highly volatile projectile that explodes to leave a line of flaming terrain. Deals 55 FIRE Damage per second, and applies BURNING, dealing 200 damage over 10s. Lasts 5s. Mod Power Requirement: 750

weaponMods.name: Accelerator
weaponMods.description: Charge Melee Attacks increase the speed of all Melee Attacks by 10% for 5s. Mod Power Requirement: N/A

weaponMods.name: Dying Breath
weaponMods.description: When infused, Neural Backdash Charge Attack explodes in a 3m. AOE and leaves an ACID Cloud which last for 15s. Mod Power Requirement: ?
